00014   int count;
00015   NAME32 item;

00018 struct InventoryList
00019 {
00020   std::vector<ContItem> list;
00021 
00022   void load(ESMReader &esm)
00023   {
00024     ContItem ci;
00025     while(esm.isNextSub("NPCO"))
00026       {
00027         esm.getHT(ci, 36);
00028         list.push_back(ci);
00029       }
00030   }     
00031 };

00033 struct Container
00034 {
00035   enum Flags
00036     {
00037       Organic   = 1, // Objects cannot be placed in this container
00038       Respawn   = 2, // Respawns after 4 months
00039       Unknown   = 8
00040     };
00041 
00042   std::string name, model, script;
00043 
00044   float weight; // Not sure, might be max total weight allowed?
00045   int flags;
00046   InventoryList inventory;
00047 
00048   void load(ESMReader &esm)
00049   {
00050     model = esm.getHNString("MODL");
00051     name = esm.getHNOString("FNAM");
00052     esm.getHNT(weight, "CNDT", 4);
00053     esm.getHNT(flags, "FLAG", 4);
00054 
00055     if(flags & 0xf4) esm.fail("Unknown flags");
00056     if(!(flags & 0x8)) esm.fail("Flag 8 not set");
00057 
00058     script = esm.getHNOString("SCRI");
00059 
00060     inventory.load(esm);
00061   }
00062 };
00063 }
00064 #endif
